name: Bucket Brain
description:
Bucket Brain is a game of Match 2, but in a dungeon crawler -esque environment. Instead of cards, though, you're up against soulbound enemies. Ones that want you either dead or very dead. The only way to make it through is to remember which enemies share the same soul, and take care of them both at once; Otherwise they'll rise back from the dead.

...or you can just swing your sword hard enough, surely you'll win eventually.

Entry for the GMTK2021 jam.
